languages.text: "Лорд-капитан!" {n}Паскаль замирает, а затем, уже спокойнее, продолжает:{/n} "Прошу вас. Вы разгневаете машинный дух до того, как мы сможем снять ограничения".
"Lord Captain!" {n}Pasqal stops and then continues more calmly,{/n} "Please. You will anger the machine spirit before we have removed the restriction."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан!" {n}Паскаль замирает, а затем, уже спокойнее, продолжает:{/n} "Прошу вас. Вы разгневаете машинный дух до того, как мы сможем снять ограничения".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}Pasqal stops and then continues more calmly,{/n} "Please. You will anger the machine spirit before we have removed the restriction."
"Lord Captain!" {n}Pasqal stops and then continues more calmly,{/n} "Please. You will anger the machine spirit before we have removed the restriction."
"Lord Captain!" {n}Pasqal stops and then continues more calmly,{/n} "Please. You will anger the machine spirit before we have removed the restriction."
"Lord Captain!" {n}Pasqal stops and then continues more calmly,{/n} "Please. You will anger the machine spirit before we have removed the restriction."

languages.text: “舰长大人！”{n}帕斯卡停了下来，以更加平和的声音继续说道。{/n}“请别这样。我们还没有撤销限制，这么做会激怒机魂。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}Pasqal stops and then continues more calmly,{/n} "Please. You will anger the machine spirit before we have removed the restriction."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人！”{n}帕斯卡停了下来，以更加平和的声音继续说道。{/n}“请别这样。我们还没有撤销限制，这么做会激怒机魂。”

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン！」{n}パスカルは立ち止まり、落ち着いて話を続ける。{/n}「お願いします。制限を解除する前に、機械精霊を怒らせてしまいます」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}Pasqal stops and then continues more calmly,{/n} "Please. You will anger the machine spirit before we have removed the restriction."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン！」{n}パスカルは立ち止まり、落ち着いて話を続ける。{/n}「お願いします。制限を解除する前に、機械精霊を怒らせてしまいます」
「ロード・キャプテン！」{n}パスカルは立ち止まり、落ち着いて話を続ける。{/n}「お願いします。制限を解除する前に、機械精霊を怒らせてしまいます」

languages.text: "Lord Captain!" {n}Pasqal unterbricht sich und fährt dann ruhiger fort:{/n} "Bitte. Ihr verärgert den Maschinengeist, bevor wir die Beschränkung entfernt haben."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}Pasqal stops and then continues more calmly,{/n} "Please. You will anger the machine spirit before we have removed the restriction."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}Pasqal unterbricht sich und fährt dann ruhiger fort:{/n} "Bitte. Ihr verärgert den Maschinengeist, bevor wir die Beschränkung entfernt haben."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! » {n}Pasqal se reprend, puis continue de manière plus posée,{/n} « Je vous en prie. Vous allez mettre l'esprit de la machine en colère avant que la restriction ne soit levée. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}Pasqal stops and then continues more calmly,{/n} "Please. You will anger the machine spirit before we have removed the restriction."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! » {n}Pasqal se reprend, puis continue de manière plus posée,{/n} « Je vous en prie. Vous allez mettre l'esprit de la machine en colère avant que la restriction ne soit levée. »

languages.text: «¡Lord Capitán!». {n}Pasqal se detiene antes de continuar con más calma.{/n} «Por favor. Hará enfadar al espíritu máquina antes de que consigamos eliminar la restricción».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}Pasqal stops and then continues more calmly,{/n} "Please. You will anger the machine spirit before we have removed the restriction."

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Capitán!». {n}Pasqal se detiene antes de continuar con más calma.{/n} «Por favor. Hará enfadar al espíritu máquina antes de que consigamos eliminar la restricción».

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan!" {n}Pasqal, duraklayıp daha sakin bir tonla devam ediyor.{/n} "Lütfen. Sınırlamayı kaldıramadan, makine ruhunu öfkelendireceksiniz."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}Pasqal stops and then continues more calmly,{/n} "Please. You will anger the machine spirit before we have removed the restriction."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan!" {n}Pasqal duruyor ve arından daha sakin bir şekilde devam ediyor.{/n} "Lütfen. Sınırlamayı kaldıramadan makine ruhunu öfkelendireceksin."
